name: photogroup
description: PhotoGroup - Zero Install, Peer-to-Peer Photo Group Collaboration.

scripts.install: cd server && npm install & cd ui && npm install
scripts.start: npm run start-server & npm run start-ui
scripts.install-start: npm run install && npm run start
scripts.build-deploy: npm run build && npm run deploy
scripts.copy-ui: npm run clean && mkdir -p ./server/build && cp -R ./ui/build/ ./server/ui/ && mv ./server/ui/build/* ./server/ui/ && rm -rf ./server/ui/build/
scripts.deploy: npm run copy-ui && cd server && npm run deploy

author: Alex Uhlmann
